title: Ad Cloud Top Level Entity Attributes DataTypes
description: Ad Cloud Top Level Entity Attributes DataTypes

xdm:externalId.title: External Entity ID
xdm:externalId.description: Unique External identifier as represented by the network for the entity object.

xdm:networkId.title: Network Internal Identifier
xdm:networkId.description: Unique Internal identifier for the network primarily used for join to the aggregated data-set.

xdm:network.title: Network
xdm:network.description: Network Name as defined by the search partners.

xdm:createdTime.title: Created Time of the Entity in Ad Cloud platform
xdm:createdTime.description: Created Time when entity got created in Ad Cloud Platform.This can differ from modified time in external advertising platform partners.

xdm:modifiedTime.title: Modified Time of the Entity in Ad Cloud Platform
xdm:modifiedTime.description: Modified Time when entity was last modified in Ad Cloud Platform. This can differ from modified time in external advertising platform partners.
